solution_line_template: In the second week, she knitted {first_week_socks} + {second_week_increase} = <<{first_week_socks}+{second_week_increase}={second_week_socks}>>{second_week_socks} pairs of socks
In the first two weeks, she knitted {first_week_socks} + {second_week_socks} = <<{first_week_socks}+{second_week_socks}={first_two_weeks_total}>>{first_two_weeks_total} pairs of socks
On the third week, she knitted {first_two_weeks_total}/{third_week_divisor} = <<{first_two_weeks_total}/{third_week_divisor}={third_week_socks}>>{third_week_socks} pairs of socks
On the fourth week, she knitted {third_week_socks} - {fourth_week_decrease} = <<{third_week_socks}-{fourth_week_decrease}={fourth_week_socks}>>{fourth_week_socks} pairs of socks

Altogether, Laticia knitted {initial_socks} + {first_week_socks} + {second_week_socks} +{third_week_socks} + {fourth_week_socks} = <<{initial_socks}+{first_week_socks}+{second_week_socks}+{third_week_socks}+{fourth_week_socks}={total_socks_knitted}>>{total_socks_knitted} pairs of socks
